text_block_list.text: It's a holiday. As I walk in front of the dorm…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hey, trainer, what are you doing?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Of course I'm wandering around. I've got a lot of free time on my hands.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: That's right! At times like these, I have to get excited. It's a motorcycle!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Mochi! …Or so I'd like to say, but I don't have a bike. It's more like an Air Rider…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: So let's go to the bike shop! Let's go see the new bikes!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Ohhh… Trainer, look! That's the ZX750 from UMAHA.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: An idiot tank. And an elite streamlined form…! The moment I get on top of it and light the engine, I'll… become a gale!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Wh-What? Don't look at me like that! I admire motorcycles.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Dad loves motorcycles, so she used to let me ride behind her.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Well, I can't buy it. It's just as easy as conquering Derby…
choice_data_list: Let's buy it to commemorate our conquest.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: To celebrate our victory?! Wait, what if I win?!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Alright, it's a promise, between you and me! That's right, if we work together, there's nothing we can't do!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Oooooh, it's getting hotter!! My body is itching……! At this rate――

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: We're going all the way to the beach! There's no bike, so use these legs!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Uoryaaaaaaa!
Vodka runs off at full speed. I desperately chase after her. …In a taxi.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: *pant*, *pant*, it feels good. Sometimes running on the road instead of the turf.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Sweaty skin and sea breeze……I can't get enough of it. This is exactly what it means to be cool……

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hey, Trainer. I know this sounds weird, but… Is there a difference between being cool and being strong?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I'm aiming to be a cool guy rather than a strong guy. Being strong is… well, part of being cool.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: You know, the other day, when I showed off even though I lost, she snorted at me. That's what bothered me.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: To me, Dad's the cool one, and Mom's the strong one.
Curious, I asked about Vodka's parents.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Dad rode a motorcycle. No, she wasn't a racer, but she always carried me around with her.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: And she used to tell me that I should always live on the brink of death, and that I should always shed tears on the wind. My dad was always like that.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: But Mom's the different type! She's always slapping Dad on the butt, running around the house, and…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Even when I ran on my own two feet, I was as fast as a motorcycle! On-road or off-road. After all, I'm a good girl.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …That's right. But the one I'm chasing is my dad's back. Is there no point in chasing her like this?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: On the other hand, I can't really say that I want to be like a strong mom…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hey, is my way of life wrong? Is it weird that I want to be cool first?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …I see. If that's what the trainer says, well, it might not be too far off.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Sometimes things that I didn't think about before come to mind, and I get all gloomy. …I guess it's time to go home.
――On the way home.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I used to ride my dad's bike down this road all the time. I usually go to the factory or the restaurant in the lower city.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: She didn't take me out to play. But…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: She always took me wherever I wanted to go. Whenever I said I wanted to go.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Bah! Stop it! That's embarrassing! But… Y-You're right.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Because Dad cared about me, I'm here now. Because she was like that, I…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: (I can still hear it. The 250 exhaust notes Dad was riding in. And I can feel it. The warmth of her arm…)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I guess I have no choice but to follow this path. Because…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: It's because I'm only on my path!
